ref.mixed-citation:
Shwetank Frost EL
Mockus TE
Ren HM
PD-1 dynamically regulates inflammation and development of brain-resident memory CD8 T cells during persistent viral encephalitis. Front Immunol 2019; 10: 783. 31105690

note.p: This paper describes that PD-1 signaling in bTrm exhibits a temporal dichotomy which contains neuroinflammation upon acute infection and maintain immune responsiveness upon reinfection
